amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for special education by $50 million.
amendment.purpose: Amendment seeks to increase funding for Individuals with Disabilities Education Act by $50,000,000 for use as Part B grants to states and will be offset by taking administrative and program management funds from OSHA and the Department of Education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bradley (NH) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 262 (Roll no. 307).
